pe:mcml.script:
local DeleteWorld = NPL.load('(gl)Mod/WorldShare/cellar/DeleteWorld/DeleteWorld.lua')
function get_select_world() return DeleteWorld.GetSelectWorld() end
function get_world_name() if not get_select_world() then return '' end
local text = ''
if get_select_world().is_zip then text = get_select_world().text .. '.zip' else text = get_select_world().foldername end
return Mod.WorldShare.Utils.WordsLimit(text, 300, 50) end
function get_status(status) if(status == 'local') then return get_select_world().status == nil or get_select_world().status ~= 2 elseif(status == 'remote') then return get_select_world().status ~= nil and get_select_world().status ~= 1 elseif(status == 'all') then return get_select_world().status ~= nil and get_select_world().status ~= 1 and get_select_world().status ~= 2 end end
function delete_remote() DeleteWorld:PasswordAuthenticationOnDeletion( 'remote', function() DeleteWorld:DeleteRemote() end ) end
function delete_local() DeleteWorld:DeleteLocal() end
function delete_all() DeleteWorld:PasswordAuthenticationOnDeletion( 'all', function() DeleteWorld:DeleteAll() end ) end
function close_page() DeleteWorld:ClosePage() end
function get_window_style() return Mod.WorldShare.Utils.FixCenter(500, 270) end
function is_multiplayer_world() local currentWorld = Mod.WorldShare.Store:Get('world/currentWorld')
if (currentWorld.project and currentWorld.project.memberCount or 0) > 1 then return true else return false end end
pe:mcml.div:
<kp:window width='500' height='260' style='<%= get_window_style() %>' title='<%=L"删除存档" %>' onclose='close_page()'>
<%= format(L'删除：%s', get_world_name()) %>
<input type='button' class='theme1_orange_button button_common' enabled='<%= get_status("local") %>' onclick='delete_local()' value='<%=L"删除本地"%>' /> <input type='button' class='theme1_orange_button button_common' enabled='<%= get_status("remote") and not is_multiplayer_world() %>' onclick='delete_remote()' value='<%= L"删除在线" %>' /> <input type='button' class='theme1_green_button button_common' enabled='<%= get_status("all") and not is_multiplayer_world() %>' onclick='delete_all()' value='<%= L"全部删除" %>' /> <input type='button' class='theme1_gray_button button_common' onclick='close_page()' value='<%= L"取消" %>' />
